subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal beat Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 6-4, on Friday and will face No. 2 Roger Federer in the final of the World Tennis Championships.
snippet: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal beat Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 6-4, on Friday and will face No. 2 Roger Federer in the final of the World Tennis Championships.
